channel.title: tv shows on toso
channel.description: Recent content in tv shows on toso

item.title: Alice in Borderland
item.description: wikipedia Watched the second season. A little disappointed, not as good as the first one. I may read the actual manga one day but not on top of my list.

item.title: The Recruit
item.description: wikipedia I wasn’t expecting much but the combination of spy and humor themes in the first two episodes hooked me in. I did not find it exceptional but still, looking forward for a second season.
